Package.Name: com.lunarg.vulkan
Package.Title: The Vulkan SDK
Package.Description: Install the Vulkan SDK and optional components.

Package.Name: com.lunarg.vulkan.core
Package.Title: The Vulkan SDK Core (Always Installed)
Package.Description: These components make up the core Vulkan SDK. This includes the Vulkan Loader, Layers, VkConfig, and other essential shader development tools.

Package.Name: com.lunarg.vulkan.vma
Package.Title: Vulkan Memory Allocator header.
Package.Description: This installs the VMA header file.
